name: Dev Sentry
description:
Streamline your GNOME Shell extension development. Dev Sentry brings real-time 'journalctl' logs directly to your panel with smart error parsing and debugging tools.

Key Features:
• Click-to-Fix: Click any error to open the exact file and line in VS Code instantly.
• Nested Shell: Launch a safe testing environment without logging out.
• Smart Filtering: Focus only on your project's logs to reduce noise.
• Color-Coded Logs: Easily spot JS Errors, Critical warnings, and Traces.

Disclaimer: This extension integrates with VS Code for workflow efficiency but is an independent project. It is NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by VS Code (Microsoft).
